Text:
yeah sorry about that, this is not DVDR.
This a dvd-rip. I shouldn't do things half-asleep...

The format is .mkv,  or Matroska Video Stream.

Are the subs built in? because I don't see a separate file.

Since the summary is low on details:

Container format: Matroska
Video Codec: MPEG-4 H.264/AVC
Audio Codec: Xiph.org OGG Vorbis
Subtitles: Advanced Substation Alpha
Group: niizk
Thank you. This film is wonderful.

Arigato gosaimazu!
This film is fantastic. I hope the rip makes justice to its aforementioned awesomeness.
Thank you for sharing the loot!
d(^_^)b
Thanks for a Japanese language version, finally! Nobody appreciates the superior quality of the original voice acting anymore, but I do! Thanks again!
